name: Dark mode for accounts.google.com
description: Google changes a lot so message me if it does not work.

user.name: Fighter169mobile
user.about:
I usually make dark modes here. Used to post a lot of styles before the pandemic.

I also use userstyles.world, an improved version of this website: https://userstyles.world/user/frostynick

If anything on my dark styles is missing, send me a message. (preferably by email)

additional_info:
3/13/2019 at 9:44 pm - This style was updated to work with Google's latest design change. Style screenshot updated to show the design change. There were also optimizations in the code and the page is dark before the page loads for a brief moment.
12/18/2018 at 6:12 pm - Several bugs on the recent update were eaten by test rats. Also holding and dragging buttons will not result in bright buttons anymore.
12/16/2018 at 10:25 pm - This style was updated to work with Google's latest design change. Style screenshot updated to show the design change.
12/4/2018 at 9:14 pm - Updated things on the Privacy and Terms section, located right before your account is created. Everything is fixed as of now, weird border issue in the last update is no longer an issue because Google themselves removed the border in the CSS (unless it is a more hidden section now)
9/18/2018 at 5:41 pm - This style was mostly updated to work with the current google style, a few fixes and updated screenshot. Other things that have been improved is that the loading after clicking something is now dark and (very small detail) arrow for clicking languages is at the exact correct color now. Last thing, sorry for the month delay.. didn't realize this didn't work. Email me (fighter169mobile@gmail.com) and it'll get fixed much quicker.
5/22/2018 at 5:47 pm - Removed "body" because it doesn't do anything anymore and Google added "Create account" as apart of accounts.google.com so it is now supported.
